nhc_headline: ...RAFAEL STRENGTHENING... ...FORECAST TO RAPIDLY INTENSIFY UNTIL LANDFALL IN WESTERN CUBA...
summary:
...RAFAEL STRENGTHENING... ...FORECAST TO RAPIDLY INTENSIFY UNTIL LANDFALL IN WESTERN CUBA...
 As of 1:00 AM EST Wed Nov 6
 the center of Rafael was located near 20.2, -80.9
 with movement NW at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 977 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.
